My Photo

Few words about me

Hi, my name is Anton, I am a front-end developer.

I found the direction that brought me great confidence in my abilities and skills. Front-end development pushes me forward to reach new levels of professionalism on a day-to-day basis.

In such meticulous task as competent coding, I am helped by perfectionism, great attention to details, scrupulousness and goal-orientation.

Professional skills:
  • Strong knowledge of HTML5/CSS3
  • Base JavaScript (jQuery), interactive, UI
  • Responsive layout (Media queries, bootstrap grid, Flexbox)
  • SCSS preprocessor
  • Gulp
  • GIT
  • Bootstrap
  • Wordpress/woocommerce
  • Photoshop
  • Neat valid code (W3C, Bootlint)
